name: St. Alonso Rodriguez

locations.description: Jesuit lay brother in Majorca, Spain

summary: Alonso Rodriguez was a Spanish Jesuit lay brother who served as a porter and doorkeeper at the Jesuit college in Majorca for 46 years. Despite his humble position, he became known for his deep spirituality, his care for students (including the future St. Peter Claver), and his mystical experiences. He is remembered for finding holiness in ordinary, everyday work and for his profound humility and devotion.
